ErrorResponse.name: ErrorResponse
ErrorResponse.description: ErrorResponse is the unified error response type. It supports both simple errors (just message) and validation errors (message + field errors).

representations.yamlSchema:
additionalProperties: false
description: ErrorResponse is the unified error response type. It supports both simple errors (just message) and validation errors (message + field errors).
properties:
    errors:
        additionalProperties:
            type: string
        description: Field-level validation errors
        type: object
    message:
        description: High-level error message
        type: string
    requestID:
        description: Request ID for tracking
        type: string
required:
    - requestID
    - message
type: object

HealthResponse.name: HealthResponse
HealthResponse.description: HealthResponse is the response to a health check request.

representations.yamlSchema:
additionalProperties: false
description: HealthResponse is the response to a health check request.
properties:
    database:
        description: Status of the database connection
        type: boolean
required:
    - database
type: object

PingResponse.name: PingResponse
PingResponse.description: PingResponse is the response to a ping request.

representations.yamlSchema:
additionalProperties: false
description: PingResponse is the response to a ping request.
properties:
    message:
        description: Human-readable message
        type: string
    metadata:
        nullable: true
        type: string
    status:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/PingStatus'
required:
    - message
    - status
type: object

PingStatus.name: PingStatus
PingStatus.description: PingStatus represents the status of a ping request.

enumValues.description: PingStatusOK means the ping was successful.
PingStatusError means there was an error with the ping.

representations.yamlSchema:
description: |
    PingStatus represents the status of a ping request.

    Possible values:
    - `OK`: PingStatusOK means the ping was successful.
    - `ERROR`: PingStatusError means there was an error with the ping.
enum:
    - OK
    - ERROR
type: string

health.description: Check if the server is healthy

ping.description: Check if the server is alive

openapiSpec:
components:
    schemas:
        ErrorResponse:
            additionalProperties: false
            description: ErrorResponse is the unified error response type. It supports both simple errors (just message) and validation errors (message + field errors).
            properties:
                errors:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    description: Field-level validation errors
                    type: object
                message:
                    description: High-level error message
                    type: string
                requestID:
                    description: Request ID for tracking
                    type: string
            required:
                - requestID
                - message
            type: object
        HealthResponse:
            additionalProperties: false
            description: HealthResponse is the response to a health check request.
            properties:
                database:
                    description: Status of the database connection
                    type: boolean
            required:
                - database
            type: object
        PingResponse:
            additionalProperties: false
            description: PingResponse is the response to a ping request.
            properties:
                message:
                    description: Human-readable message
                    type: string
                metadata:
                    nullable: true
                    type: string
                status:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/PingStatus'
            required:
                - message
                - status
            type: object
        PingStatus:
            description: |
                PingStatus represents the status of a ping request.

                Possible values:
                - `OK`: PingStatusOK means the ping was successful.
                - `ERROR`: PingStatusError means there was an error with the ping.
            enum:
                - OK
                - ERROR
            type: string
info:
    description: Cloud API Documentation
    title: Cloud API
    version: vdev (72d099a-dirty)
openapi: 3.0.3
paths:
    /api/health:
        get:
            description: Check if the server is healthy
            operationId: health
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                Success:
                                    value:
                                        database: true
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HealthResponse'
                    description: Successful health response
                "413":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                Request Entity Too Large:
                                    value:
                                        message: Request body too large (max 1MB)
                                        requestID: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
                    description: Request entity too large
                "500":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
                    description: Internal server error
                "503":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                Database Unavailable:
                                    value:
                                        database: false
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HealthResponse'
                    description: Server unavailable
            summary: Check server health
            tags:
                - Core
    /api/ping:
        get:
            description: Check if the server is alive
            operationId: ping
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                Success:
                                    value:
                                        message: Pong
                                        status: OK
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PingResponse'
                    description: Successful ping response
                "413":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                Request Entity Too Large:
                                    value:
                                        message: Request body too large (max 1MB)
                                        requestID: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
                    description: Request entity too large
                "500":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                Internal Server Error:
                                    value:
                                        message: Internal Server Error
                                        requestID: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
                    description: Internal Server Error
            summary: Ping the server
            tags:
                - Core
servers:
    - description: Local server
      url: http://localhost:8080
